name: Project PETRA
description:
A prototype of a game created for a school assignment.

An Escape The Room Puzzle game featuring Visual Novel elements. Heavily inspired by the "Zero Escape" series.
The prototype features one Escape The Room sequence - Roughly 20-30 min play time.

First thing I've made using the Unity Engine; being a fan of the this type of genre of games I created this game to learn how to use the game engine itself, therefore the quality of the game leaves a lot to be desired.
Nonetheless if you do choose to take a gander at this game, I hope you find something you enjoy.

References:

Music gathered from "TeknoAXE Royalty Free Music"
TeknoAXE.com
